GSP33madhsiddhb_u:901: api vyāpakatvād dhitatvaprayogāt svataḥ siddhabhāvād ananyāśrayatvāt /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:902: jagattuccham etat samastaṃ tad anyat tad eko 'vaśiṣṭaḥ śivaḥ kevalo 'ham // 9 //
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:905: iti śruteḥ sākṣiṇo 'nyat sākṣyaṃ sarvaṃ jagattucchaṃ, na tu sākṣī /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:909: iti śruteḥ paricchinnatvatucchatvayoḥ samavyāptatvāt paricchinnatvanivṛttyā tucchatvanivṛttir ity āha -- vyāpakatvād iti /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:913: nanu, sarvavyāpakatvena nityatvād bhāvarūpatvāc cātmā na duḥkhanivṛttirūpaḥ,
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:916: tathā cātmasvarūpo mokṣo 'puruṣārtha evety āśaṅkya, na,
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:919: “tad etat preyaḥ putrāt preyo vittāt preyo 'nyasmāt sarvasmād antarataraṃ yad ayam ātmeti” (BAU I.4.8.)
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:925: ajñānavyavahitasya ca tasyāprāptasyeva jñānamātrād avidyānivṛttyā prāptir iva bhavatīti taduddeśena mumukṣupravṛttyupapattiḥ /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:926: adhyastasya prapañcasya duḥkhasvarūpasyādhiṣṭhānatvāt sa evābhāva iti duḥkhābhāvarūpatvenāpi tasya puruṣārthatā /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:927: nanu, mokṣe sukhaṃ saṃvedyate na vā /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:929: vyañjakābhāve 'pi tatsaṃvedanābhyupagame saṃsāradaśāyām api tathā prasaṅgāt /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:933: ata eva śarkarātadbhojinor iveti vaiṣṇavaṃ manyamānānām udgāra iti cet, na,
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:936: yady api saṃsāradaśāyām avidyāvṛtarūpatvād ātmā paramānandarūpatayā na prathate tathāpi
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:937: tattvavidyayāvidyānivṛttau svaprakāśatayā svayam eva paramānandarūpeṇa prakāśata
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:940: jñānasya dhātvartharūpatayā kriyātvena sāśrayatvāt jānāmīti pratīteḥ,
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:942: tathā ca katham advaitavāda ity āśaṅkya, na,
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:944: “yatsākṣād aparokṣād brahma ya ātmā sārvāntaraḥ” (BAU III.4.1.)
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:946: antaḥkaraṇatādātmyādhyāsena ca tadvṛttau jñānādhyāsāj jānāmīti tadāśrayatvapratītiḥ /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:947: dhātvarthatvam utpattivināśavattvaṃ cāntaḥkaraṇavṛtter iti jñaptirūpamukhajñānasya sarvādhiṣṭhānatvenānyāśrayatvābhāvān na dvaitāpattiḥ /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:948: tena jñānasukhātmaka ātmā satyas tadbhinnaṃ ca sarvaṃ jagad asatyam iti siddham // 9 //
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:949: nanu, sarvasya jagatas tucchatve tanniṣedhenātmatattvapratipattir na syāt /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:951: kvacit pramitaṃ kvacin niṣidhyata iti nyāyāt /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:952: tathā ca niṣedhānupapattyaiva na jagatas tucchatvam iti, na, ity āha --
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:953: na caikaṃ tadanyad dvitīyaṃ kutaḥ syāt na vā kevalatvaṃ na cākevalatvam /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:954: na śūnyaṃ na cāśūnyam advaitakatvāt kathaṃ sarvavedāntasiddhaṃ bravīmi // 10 //
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:961: na, ity āha -- na vā kevalatvam iti /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:964: yady ātmana ekatvaṃ śrutyā na pratipādyate,
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:965: tarhi pratyakṣādipramāṇavaśād anekatvaṃ syād iti cet, na,
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:972: tarhi sarvapratiṣedhāc chūnyam eva syād iti, na,
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:974: “asann eva sa bhavati asad brahmeti veda cet,
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:975: asti brahmeti ced veda santam enaṃ tato vidur iti” (TU II.6.)
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:978: ity upakramya “aitadātmyam idaṃ sarvaṃ tat satyaṃ sa ātmā tat tvam asi” (ChU VI.8.7.)
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:981: ekam advitīyam iti padadvayena sarvabhedapratiṣedhe 'py evakāreṇa dharmadharmibhāvādibhedābhedapratiṣedhāt /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:983: dvidhā itaṃ dvītaṃ tasya bhāvo dvaitam /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:984: tad uktaṃ vārtike “dvidhetaṃ dvītam ity āhus tadbhāvo dvaitam ucyate” (BAUBhV IV.3.1807.) iti /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:985: na vidyate dvaitaṃ dvidhābhāvo yatra tad advaitam ity akṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:987: pratiyogijñānasyaiva lāghavenābhāvabuddhau kāraṇatvāt dvaitasyānirvacanīyatvāṅgīkāreṇa pratyakṣādivedyatvān niṣedhopapattir ity arthaḥ /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:988: tarhy etādṛśa ātmā aṅulinirdeśena pratipādyatām iti, na,
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:992: , “yato vāco nivartante aprāpya mānasā saha” (TU II.4.)
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:995: vāgaviṣayatve kathaṃ vedāntānāṃ tatra prāmāṇyam iti cet, na,
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:996: aviṣaye 'py ātmani tadākāravṛttimātreṇa tadavidyānivartakatvād ity āha -- sarvavedāntasiddham iti /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:997: tathā ca śrutiḥ “yasyāmataṃ tasya mataṃ mataṃ yasya na veda saḥ /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:999: , “yan manasā na manute yenāhur mano mataṃ,
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:1000: tad eva brahma tvaṃ viddhi nedaṃ yad idam upāsate” (KU I.5.)
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:1002: tad evaṃ vedāntavākyajanyākhaṇdākāravṛttyā avidyānivṛttau tatkalpitasakalānarthanivṛttau paramānandarūpaḥ san kṛtakṛtyo bhavatīti siddham //
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:1003: na staumi taṃ vyāsam aśeṣam arthaṃ samyaṅ na sūtrair api yo babandha /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:1004: vināpi taiḥ saṅgrathitākhilārthaṃ taṃ śaṅkaraṃ staumi sureśvaraṃ ca // 1 //
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:1005: laghur api bahvarthavahaś cintāmaṇir iva nibandho 'yam /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:1007: yad atra sauṣṭhavaṃ kiñcit tadguror iva me na hi /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:1008: yad atrāsauṣṭhavaṃ kiñcit tan mamaiva guror na hi // 3 //
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:1009: bahuyācanayā mayāyamalpo balabhadrasya kṛe kṛto nibandhaḥ /
GSP33madhsiddhb_u:1010: yad aduṣṭam ihāsti yac ca duṣṭaṃ tadudārāḥ sudhiyo vivecayantu // 4 //
